name: flaunted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
flaunt
to show or make obvious something you are proud of in order to get admiration: He's got a lot of money but he doesn't flaunt it. Flavio was flaunting his tan in a pair of white trunks. flaunt yourself
UK to show your body in a confident and sexual manner
